titleStmt.title: The masque of the Inner Temple and Grayes Inne Grayes Inne and the Inner Temple, presented before his Maiestie, the Queenes Maiestie, the Prince, Count Palatine and the Lady Elizabeth their Highnesses, in the Banquetting house at White-hall on Saturday the twentieth day of Februarie, 1612.
titleStmt.author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by F[elix] K[ingston] for George Norton, and are to be sold at his shoppe neere Temple-bar,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Another edition, with cancel title page omitting Beaumont's name, of the edition published earlier the same year.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
